channel.title: Probably easy question plz help plz important lol
channel.description: hi guys should be a easy question i got a server a few days ago theres a custom crown on it and i want to know how to change it so my account can have that crown if i log on to the custom made owner account already there it has the nice crown so how can i have that crown on my profile?

item.title: Probably easy question plz help plz important lol
item.dc:creator: @insane_pk insane pk
item.description:
@insane_pk wrote:

Change your Rank on your myphpadmin files to the character you want with admin status. Change it to 1 for yellow crown admin, 2 white crown for mod, and 3 for green crown (pmod). It will either say 0 or 4 for the default, pending if your changing forum rank or in game rank. You change them numbers to 1 2 or 3.

Read full topic
item.source: Probably easy question plz help plz important lol
